attributes.action: Life Sentence to "MEAN" Life in Prison for Murder
attributes.additional_details:
A LIFE SENTENCE TO MEAN  LIFE IN PRISON.
We propose that for those who have committed the crime of murder a mandatory life sentence should be imposed and this should mean until the death of the prisoner i.e. Life Meaning Life
Remove the eligibility of parole for murderers who have been convicted of premeditated and aggravated murder


Life should mean life when given as a prison sentence and all criminals already convicted of Murder should be included in life meaning life.
 Every day we read about murderers being given a life sentence and before we know it they are free, and go on to commit similar/exact same crimes again on release.  We need a more substantial deterrent in the UK.
Life 4 A Life
